about_the_game:
OBJECTIVES

You've decided to work for yourself and have taken out a big loan on a spaceship. Your job is to fly to nearby asteroids and mine through caves to collect gems. You use the cash you earn to travel to new asteroids with higher risks and rewards--or you can buy upgrades to your tools and your spaceship. Explore the asteroids, watching for all sorts of enemies along the way, especially those that come out at night.

DON'T GO BY YOURSELF

The evils present on the asteroids prey on the vulnerable and singled-out, so the help of your friends is invaluable. The ever-fluctuating gem markets stops for no man, so it's good to have someone ready to day trade at the ship. There are many goods available for rocket delivery via the store, including torches, pickaxe upgrades, fuel expansion tanks, or spacesuit upgrades.

MOVE QUICKLY

The day on the asteroid goes fast. Communicate with your crew to get back to the ship and have money for fuel to take off.

This game contains no real-money microtransactions. No AI was used in the making of this game.
